name: Live Support
clarification_prompt: I didn't get what you mean. Please rephrase it.
Sorry, I didn't get that. Can you rephrase it?
Pardon me, could you please rephrase that?
hangup_phrase: Sorry, I could not assist at the moment. Please try again later. Thank you!

utterances.body: How do I file a leave?
Where do I file a leave?

body: From the sidebar, select Leaves > Requests > Request a Leave.
You may select Leaves > Requests > Request a Leave from the sidebar to do file a leave.
